CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 21, 1963, pg. 3 reads: "Smith Family Survivors - Pictured above are the wife, four children and the mother and father of James Smith, of 2258 Bedford, Ave., who lost his life in the auto accident last Saturday on the 31st Street Bridge. Mrs. Doris Smith, (Center) is holding little Patrice, while Charlene is cuddled by the victim's mother and Harry (left) and James Jr.  flank their grandfather. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of surviving family members of car accident victim James Smith, including wife Doris Smith in center holding daughter Patrice, daughter Charlene held by mother Mrs. Smith, and sons Harry and James Jr. on either side of father Mr. Smith, in home at 2258 Bedford Avenue, another version
